title: ReadingLasses
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Somewhat unique combination of award winning alcohol licensed bookshop cafe with overnight accommodation. Also offers bookshop weddings & a writing room. Organic herbs and veggies from their garden. Gluten free, vegetarian (including vegan) items marked on the menu.
Dog friendly, Scottish, Wifi, vegan friendly, not 100% vego
streetAddress: 17 S Main St, Wigtown, Newton Stewart
